result.execSummary:
All charges against Jonathen William Odenbreit in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jonathen William Odenbreit is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jonathen William Odenbreit

defendant.name: Odenbreit, Jonathen William
defendant.address: 603 W Evans St, Rice Lake, WI 54868

records.addlTxt: 11:30: Defendant appears via audio visual zoom.  Atty Richard Shawl appears via audio visual zoom.  Atty Michael Schiek appears in person.  Atty Schiek statement to court - moves to dismiss and states reasons.  Atty Shawl statement.  Court grants motion to dismiss and notes any bond posted to be refunded to whomever posted it.  adj: 11:32 a.m.

2:39 PM Defendant Jonathen William Odenbreit in court.  Attorney Richard John Shawl in court for Jonathen William Odenbreit.  Prosecuting attorney Mary M Sowinski Ms. in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
In receipt, waive reading- set for preliminary hearing. Time limits waived.
Bail continued. 
If waiver of prelim - court will allow zoom appr.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 29, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Notified Jack - appeared via video from Chippewa.
all conditions remain

1:22 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jonathen William Odenbreit appeared by video, in custody at the Chippewa County Jail. Defendant states only being held on Oneida County warrant - statement to current address. Pfeifer statement to bond. Court sets bond and quashes warrant. adj. 01:24 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Per Jack at ONSO - defendant is in Chippewa County Jail - Detainer placed

3:17 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jonathen William Odenbreit not in court. Court review of case. Schiek requests warrant be authorized. Court authorizes warrant. adj. 03:18 PM
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report

3:05 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jonathen William Odenbreit appeared by video. Court states PD's office is still searching for counsel. Bond continued. adj. 03:07 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

2:39 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jonathen William Odenbreit appeared by video. Court states Defendant eligible for PD - still searching for counsel. Bond continued. adj. 02:40 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 9, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
SPD Status of Counsel Report

3:00 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Jonathen William Odenbreit appeared in court. Court review of case - PD's office has not appointed counsel yet. Court to set out. Bond continued. adj. 03:02 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 11, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
SPD Status of Counsel Report

2:54 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Jonathen William Odenbreit appeared in court. Court states conflict in PD's office and they are still searching for counsel. Court will set out. Bond continued. adj. 02:55 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 14, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
protective
Not operate a motor vehicle without a license

2:29 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Jonathen William Odenbreit appeared in court. In receipt of complaint, right to counsel. Court set bond over weekend. Court continued. adj. 02:32 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for February 14, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
